data.name: NoMoreCaptchasExplanation
data.value: Get rid of CAPTCHAs by verifying your mobile phone. Submit your cell phone number and we'll text you a code to enter in the form below and be done with CAPTCHAs on this computer. This will only eliminate CAPTCHAs on this computer, so don't complete this process if you're on a public computer.

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmationCodeNotValidMessage
data.value: The confirmation code you have entered is invalid. Please double-check and try again.

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmationEmailSentMessage
data.value: A confirmation email was sent to your new email address. Please confirm this change by clicking the link in the email or entering the confirmation code in the form below.

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmationEmailSentMessage
data.value: You have requested to change your contact email address. A confirmation email was sent to your new email address. Please confirm this change by clicking the link in the email or entering the confirmation code in the form below.

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmationSuccessMessage
data.value: You have successfully changed your email address.

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmationSuccessTitle
data.value: Your Email Address Has Been Changed

data.name: ChangeEmailErrorOccurredMessage
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again in a few minutes.

data.name: ChangeEmailInvalidPasswordMessage
data.value: The password you have entered is invalid. Please double-check and try again.

data.name: ChangeEmailNewAddressAlreadyInUseMessage
data.value: That email is already in use. Please double check the email address and try again. Please visit the help page for more information.

data.name: ChangeEmailNewAddressBannedMessage
data.value: The email address you have entered is from a email server that is currently banned. Please try with another email address.

data.name: ChangeEmailNewAddressInvalidMessage
data.value: The email address you have entered is invalid. Please double check the address and submit again.

data.name: ChangeEmailNewAddressInvalidFormatMessage
data.value: The email address you have entered is in a invalid format. Please double check the address and submit again.

data.name: ChangeEmailNewAddressTooShortMessage
data.value: The email address you have entered is too short. Please double check the address and submit again.

data.name: ChangeEmailRequestCancelledMessage
data.value: You have cancelled your request to change your primary contact email address.

data.name: ConfirmEmailChange
data.value: Confirm Change of Primary Email Address

data.name: ChangeEmailAreYouSure
data.value: Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmCancelMessage
data.value: By clicking "Confirm Cancel" below, you will cancel your request to change your primary contact email address.

data.name: ChangeEmailCaptchaRequiredMessage
data.value: In order to continue please enter the characters that you see below.

data.name: ChangeEmailInvalidCaptchaMessage
data.value: The security code you have entered is invalid. Please double-check and try again.
